name: crypto-module
description: This module offers a an interface between some cipher methods of nodes built-in crypto library and nativescript as well as offering the same interface for some self implemented ciphers, e.g. caesar cipher.

scripts.test: mkdir test && cp test.js test/ && cd test && npm --cache-min Infinity install ../ && node test.js && cd .. && rm -rf test && exit 0

author: Marvin Kr√ºger
